titleStmt.title: A new book containing sundry set-forms of [p]rayers, thanksgivings and graces [c]omposed chiefly for the benefit of children and youth : [bu]t may be useful to all such as are destitute of better helps, to further them in their godly practices.
titleStmt.author: Killiray, Matthew.

titleStmt.title: A new book containing sundry set-forms of [p]rayers, thanksgivings and graces [c]omposed chiefly for the benefit of children and youth : [bu]t may be useful to all such as are destitute of better helps, to further them in their godly practices.
titleStmt.author: Killiray, Matthew.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Matthew Killiray by Wing (2nd. ed.)
Imperfect: stained, tightly bound, cropped and defaced, with loss of print; bracketed material lost in binding.
Reproduction of original in: William Andrews Clark Memorial Library, University of California, Los Angeles.
